name: The Best Chocolate Sauce
description: Use good quality chocolate and cocoa powder. You’ll appreciate the difference in this intensely dark and flavorful chocolate sauce. In place of the corn syrup, you can use agave nectar, rice syrup, or golden syrup. Note that it will lend a slightly different flavor to the sauce, but it’ll still be absolutely delicious.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces (55g) bittersweet or semisweet chocolate (finely chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, whisk together the water, sugar, corn syrup, and cocoa powder.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium saucepan, whisk together the water, sugar, corn syrup, and cocoa powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the mixture over medium heat, whisking frequently. Once it just begins to boil, remove from heat and stir in the chopped chocolate until melted.
